# xrayspecs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of xrayspecs is to do model-agnostic iterpretation of black-box models.

## Installation

You cannot currently install xrayspecs from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org). However, you can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval=FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("mt-edwards/xrayspecs")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
#library(xrayspecs)
## basic example code
```
